channel.title: Allstar 317 need help with a basic command
channel.description:
i want to create a command that when you use some item into an object that has a level requirement it will remove it from your backback and gain you exp
for example use a torstol seed that has a 53 lvl requirement for farming into a farming patch will remove it and grant you exp and a torstol and a code that will tell if they dont have enough farming level to plant it

item.title: Allstar 317 need help with a basic command
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

if u need any more help of allstar, you can ask me

Read full topic

item.source: Allstar 317 need help with a basic command

item.title: Allstar 317 need help with a basic command
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Daztech, post:15, topic:477326”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=595519.msg4195000#msg4195000 date=1357392381]

im really sorry for sounding like a complete noob but i have no idea how to convert

Uhg il do when i get home. If u still need help then.

Search in ur client.java

if(objectID == URID){
if(playerHasItem(URID, 1)) {
deleteItem(URID, 1);
addItem(URID, 1);
addSkillxp(6, 398488);
sM(“I AM AWESOME”);
} else
sM(“I AINT AWESOME”);
}
[/quote]
finally, thank you btw i think that is the delta way of making codes, i figured out how to change them for allstar source so thank you.[/quote]
Oh whoops just saw u use allstar…
Im so blind:o

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar 317 need help with a basic command
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Daztech, post:11, topic:477326”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=595519.msg4194983#msg4194983 date=1357390498]

Just use the bones on altar frim prayer as base and make it urself
If u then got any problems post here.

i think the allstar one doesnt actually have it.

I bet there are shit loads of tutorials for it.
Anywas first try before u spent time in tuts

well yeah your probably right, just thought that people on moparscape forums like to help, and ive had this topic for a pretty long time and noone wants to awnser, maybe cuz of all the allstar haters.

To do it pretty simple.
Search the case for clicking th object.
Then add sumthin like this behind it:

&& playerHasItem(itemID)) { c.deleteitem c.addItem c.addskillxp c.sendMessage } else { c.sendMessage
This must get u started i hope?
[/quote]
im using allstar :|[/quote]
Te playerhasitem thing was pretty much the same as allstar i believe.
And you can easily convert them.
I aint home now so cant do it atm

Read full topic
